about_the_game:
Gameplay Overview:


Just simply control the character to collect gold coins, and you can easily unlock the next level.

Game Highlights:


  • One-Touch Gameplay: The controls are super simple, easy to pick up, and you won't have to worry about levels being too difficult to frustrate you.
  • No More Stuck: Stuck for five minutes? Don't worry, the skip button has been thoughtfully added.
  • Gradual Challenge: Levels become increasingly challenging as you progress, but they will never make you feel like you can't go on.
  • Refreshingly Clear Graphics: The game interface is simple yet attractive, making the gameplay comfortable on the eyes.
  • Day and Night Cycle, Theme of Your Choice: Prefer day or night? Choose for yourself, and there's always something new every day.
  • Steam Cloud Save, Progress Always with You: Steam cloud save allows you to save your game progress at any time, so you can continue playing on any computer.
  • Achievement Collection Never Stops: Complete various small tasks, unlock achievements, and enjoy a sense of accomplishment.

As a solo developer, there are bound to be some oversights or areas that aren't completely satisfying. If you encounter any issues, please feel free to give me suggestions at any time; let's work together to make the game even better! Thank you for every player's participation!

Gameplay Overview:


Just simply control the character to collect gold coins, and you can easily unlock the next level.

Game Highlights:


  • One-Touch Gameplay: The controls are super simple, easy to pick up, and you won't have to worry about levels being too difficult to frustrate you.
  • No More Stuck: Stuck for five minutes? Don't worry, the skip button has been thoughtfully added.
  • Gradual Challenge: Levels become increasingly challenging as you progress, but they will never make you feel like you can't go on.
  • Refreshingly Clear Graphics: The game interface is simple yet attractive, making the gameplay comfortable on the eyes.
  • Day and Night Cycle, Theme of Your Choice: Prefer day or night? Choose for yourself, and there's always something new every day.
  • Steam Cloud Save, Progress Always with You: Steam cloud save allows you to save your game progress at any time, so you can continue playing on any computer.
  • Achievement Collection Never Stops: Complete various small tasks, unlock achievements, and enjoy a sense of accomplishment.

As a solo developer, there are bound to be some oversights or areas that aren't completely satisfying. If you encounter any issues, please feel free to give me suggestions at any time; let's work together to make the game even better! Thank you for every player's participation!
name: One Pass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760/ Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: "One Pass": A Stress-Reliever,a New Leisure Favorite!Control adorable little characters,collect gold coins, and navigate through fantasy levels.But don't underestimate the challenges, as each level hides the author's "little pranks" full of traps and humorous moments.Are you ready? Let's get started
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean*, Polish*, Dutch*
*languages with full audio support
